questions.question: The ISO/IEC 14764 standard defines software maintenance as activities required to support a software system effectively.
Which of the following is NOT a type of maintenance activity?
Preventive maintenance is often performed on safety-critical systems to prevent future failures.
The four types of maintenance activities are Corrective, Adaptive, Preventive, and ______.
Adaptive maintenance modifies the software to interface with a changing environment.
The ISO/IEC 14764 standard defines software maintenance as activities required to support a software system effectively.
